news_title: XRP Approaches Apex Of Multi-Year Triangle Pattern Despite Near-Term Resistance

news_title: XRP Exchange Supply Shrinks as ETF Demand Tightens Available Liquidity

news_title: XRP Supply Tightens With 1.5 Billion Left on Exchanges, 2026 Scenario Emerges
